name: Asociația Camera Franceză de Comerț, Industrie și Agricultură în România
membership:
Coaliția pentru Dezvoltarea României (https://coalitia.org/)
CCI France International (https://www.ccifrance-international.org/)
goal: A business community centered on the French know-how which works for the sustainable development of the Romania creating development opportunities for people, helping companies to grow and representing the interests of the French-Romanian community.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
